function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of aerosol dryer to ensure uniformity of particles","Impact":"Potential for viral particles to be distributed in the environment","Mitigation":"Use of containment measures and air filtration systems","Technologies":"Air purification systems, HEPA filters, negative pressure systems","People":"Occupational workers, environmental occupants","Owner":"Facility management, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Effect of relative humidity on UV effectiveness against bacteria and viruses","Impact":"Contrasting effects of relative humidity on UVGI effectiveness against different types of microbes","Mitigation":"Review and adjustment of UVGI systems based on environmental conditions","Technologies":"UVGI systems, environmental monitoring sensors","People":"Occupational workers, environmental occupants","Owner":"Facility management, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Limited data on UV inactivation of viral aerosols","Impact":"Insufficient information for accurate assessment of UVGI effectiveness","Mitigation":"Conducting additional research and experiments on UV inactivation of viral aerosols","Technologies":"Laboratory equipment, environmental monitoring sensors","People":"Specialist researchers, public health authorities","Owner":"Research institutions, public health authorities"}]}
